items.name: Favorite Genres
items.description: What I love to listen to
items.content:
# My Favorite Music Genres

I enjoy a wide variety of music genres:

- **Rock** - Classic and alternative rock
- **Electronic** - Synthwave and ambient
- **Jazz** - Smooth and bebop
- **Classical** - Orchestral compositions

Music is a constant companion in my coding journey.

items.name: Current Playlist
items.content:
# Currently Playing

My coding playlist rotates frequently, but here are some favorites:

1. Daft Punk - Random Access Memories
2. Pink Floyd - Dark Side of the Moon
3. Miles Davis - Kind of Blue

items.name: React
items.content:
# React Expertise

I specialize in building modern, performant React applications:

- **Hooks & Context** - State management
- **Component Architecture** - Scalable patterns
- **Performance Optimization** - Code splitting, memoization
- **Testing** - Jest, React Testing Library

items.name: Senior Developer
items.content:
# Senior Developer

**Company:** Tech Corp
**Duration:** 2023 - Present

## Responsibilities

- Lead frontend development team
- Architecture design and code review
- Mentoring junior developers
- Performance optimization

## Key Achievements

- Reduced bundle size by 40%
- Implemented new design system
- Led migration to React 18
